name: tbss_2_reg
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: TBSS utility for target selection and registration for Tract-Based Spatial Statistics (TBSS) analysis

inputs.description: Use FMRIB58_FA_1mm as the target for nonlinear registrations (recommended)
inputs.name: Use FMRIB58_FA_1mm

inputs.description: Use the specified image as the target for nonlinear registrations
inputs.name: Target Image

inputs.description: Find the best target from all images in the FA
inputs.name: Find Best Target

groups.description: Choose one of the target-selection options
groups.name: Target Selection Options
